title: America, My Face Is Saying Everything That You Need To Know
description: The title is saying everything that you need to know

title: The Problem with the FizzBuzz Problem
description: FizzBuzz is not the basic, sanity-check interview question that many presume it to be. Use it and you might just end up filtering out some of your good candidates who, unfortunately, suffer from the Smart Person's Mirage.

title: Dwitter - javascript demos in 140 characters
description: Dwitter is a social network for building and sharing visual javascript demos limited to 140 characters.

title: faces.js
description: A JavaScript library for generating vector-based cartoon faces

title: How the SP-404 Came to Dominate the Global Beat Scene
description: Given the meteoric rise in popularity the 404 has experienced over the past five to 10 years, it's worth asking the question: How did this sampler become such a global phenomenon, despite modest initial commercial success and a relatively slow adoption from the producer community?

title: Searching for Tomorrow: The Story of Madlib and DOOM's Madvillainy
description: Following the 10th anniversary of Madlib and DOOM's telepathic mind meld of an album, Jeff Weiss traces the history of Madvillain and details how these two perpetually mystifying artists came together for an uncanny hip-hop classic.

title: Everything I needed to know about writing, I learned from “Paid In Full”
description: Nearly twenty-eight years after its release, the album offers the best look at the lives of writers

title: Wild Ramp Publishing
description: shout out to Keidra and her team!

title: Blogroll.org
description: you'll never guess what this site does!

title: Waxy.org
description: Andy Baio - blogger and Web technologist. I love a link blog

title: Floating Point Math
description: An in-depth analysis of floating point maths in different programming languages.

title: St. Unix Clown College for the Criminally Insane
Why does HTML think “chucknorris” is a color?
description: A fascinating rabbit hole involving CSS, colours, and random words.

title: Infinite Craft
description: A super addictive game where you craft a variety of things by combining the four elements (earth, wind, fire, and water). Created by Neal Agarwal using a large language model called Llama 2

title: 'Golfballia ambusta' and the tale of a fungus hoax
description: How three burnt golf balls gave mycology a 'Dada moment' and possibly an existential crisis.

title: Please, don’t force me to log in
description: Juha-Matti Santala points out a lot of services needing account logins for arbitrary reasons.

title: 1967 NFL Championship Game
description: Because of the adverse conditions in which the game was played, the rivalry between the two teams, and the game's dramatic climax, it has been immortalized as the Ice Bowl
